author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
The_Donald discord got deleted earlier today, and pretty much every platform banned anything they think is "pro trump".

However evil has a way of backfiring sometimes. Hopefully discord deletes ruqqcord in the process, as well as RCP and any other shitholes the admins are involved in that are ruining ruqqus. Of course this would be an abusive action and I would never support it. But it would have a fucking huge positive affect on ruqqus.com if the admins and their buddies couldn't cabal around on discord anymore. Maybe they'd actually start participating on the website their discord circlejerk club is named after. I don't think they even realize what ruqqus is like anymore because they're always on discord. Even better is that I'm not worried about the history in the server being erased because the admins just delete all the channels every few months anyway.

title: Look at the bright side, the ruqqus discord might get banned!

body:
That's assuming this site isn't doomed, which it is. They sealed their own fate already. I don't think this site is all that important to them, based on their demeanor they act like it's just a temporary shell company to launder money with until they eventually scrap it out. Their blatant neglect is evidence enough they aren't serious about it. 

The banning of anything isn't a good thing. Even if its karma, it sets the precedence that free speech is dead.

post.title: Look at the bright side, the ruqqus discord might get banned!

body:
Actually the banning of the ruqqus discord is a good thing, as everyone already knows that discord isn't a free speech platform and it should never have been used to host communication for this website in the first place.

Ruqqus being banned would also be great, ain't no one curr about all the idiots that got sucker punched into paying towards this money laundering scheme.
